name: MystoriArt Portfolio
description: Portfolio created for Digital artist. Links to About page and current works

name: TechFlix
description: Streaming app designed like netflix. Allows you to view trailers when movies are clicked. Deployed with firebase

name: MyRume-App
description: Created a Social media website clone. The website has sign in with Google Authentication and posting functionality. The project was authenticated and deployed to firebase

name: Chattable
description: Social Media app. Twitter like ui and responsive design. created with react and deployed with firebase.

name: Plantie
description: Plant care and tracking App. Created the backend Schema and assisted in the frontend creation. The group worked perfectly in sync and we all knew what tasks we wanted to take on. The app is able to use the schema to show daily tasks as well as plant data.

name: Pokedex
description: A Pokedex app, that has a list of all pokemon. Click on the name of a pokemon and then add to team. It will appear on the My Team page.

name: Weather App
description: Weather app created in React that predicts weather for today, just enter city and wether you want fahrenheit, or celcius

name: Adventure Time Listing App
description: Personal listing app of information on your favorite Adventure Time characters. Able to edit existing characters and add others on your own.

name: The Kat & KaPoodle
description: A pet care and adoption website, created with Ruby as backend, React, and Materialize css for front end. Has chat functionality as well as shows info when clicking on a pet.
